test-case.name: [C3] User should be able to check filters after search
test-case.title: [C3] User should be able to check filters after search

step.name: Fill search bar with Samsung value
step.title: Fill search bar with Samsung value

step.name: Check several filters with the following data: {"Cell Phone Operating System":"Android","Cell Phone Camera Resolution":"13 to 19.9 MP","Cell Phone Features":["Dual Camera","Bluetooth Enabled"],"Cell Phone Internal Storage Memory":"16 GB"}
step.title: Check several filters with the following data: {"Cell Phone Operating System":"Android","Cell Phone Camera Resolution":"13 to 19.9 MP","Cell Phone Features":["Dual Camera","Bluetooth Enabled"],"Cell Phone Internal Storage Memory":"16 GB"}

step.name: Click on checkbox section Cell Phone Operating System filter Android
step.title: Click on checkbox section Cell Phone Operating System filter Android

step.name: Click on checkbox section Cell Phone Camera Resolution filter 13 to 19.9 MP
step.title: Click on checkbox section Cell Phone Camera Resolution filter 13 to 19.9 MP

step.name: Click on checkbox section Cell Phone Features filter Dual Camera
step.title: Click on checkbox section Cell Phone Features filter Dual Camera

step.name: Click on checkbox section Cell Phone Features filter Bluetooth Enabled
step.title: Click on checkbox section Cell Phone Features filter Bluetooth Enabled

step.name: Click on checkbox section Cell Phone Internal Storage Memory filter 16 GB
step.title: Click on checkbox section Cell Phone Internal Storage Memory filter 16 GB

step.name: Verify filters {"Cell Phone Operating System":"Android","Cell Phone Camera Resolution":"13 to 19.9 MP","Cell Phone Features":["Dual Camera","Bluetooth Enabled"],"Cell Phone Internal Storage Memory":"16 GB"} to have checked status true
step.title: Verify filters {"Cell Phone Operating System":"Android","Cell Phone Camera Resolution":"13 to 19.9 MP","Cell Phone Features":["Dual Camera","Bluetooth Enabled"],"Cell Phone Internal Storage Memory":"16 GB"} to have checked status true
